name: Planes Combat
description:
Welcome back, Mr.Pilot! We urgently need your help.

The Planes Combat game is a simulator that will integrate you into a virtual aerial world. Your mission is to learn to drive several types of planes very quickly because it is necessary to liberate some territories that belong to the army you belong to.

This is how it happened that in one moment all the alarm alerts were lit that there is someone foreign on the territory. Put on your gloves and we'll be waiting for you on the runway to fly as fast as possible towards the enemies.

Are you ready ?

Game features :
- 3 personal jets (JET 1980-1,R12-J0,F10-12)
- 2 Game Modes ( Avatar Fight/Air Combat)
- Rocket Shop
